sentences.en: He felt a sudden inexpressible loneliness.
sentences.cn: 他突然有种难以言喻的孤独感。

sentences.en: Many deaf people have feelings of isolation and loneliness.
sentences.cn: 许多失聪的人有孤独和寂寞的感觉。

sentences.en: Loneliness is a high price to pay for independence in your old age.
sentences.cn: 孤寂是老年独自生活要付出的高昂代价。
